src:
Chat revela que coronel dio orden de matar a ex-Farc y vigilar a quienes lo buscaban
La conversación de los uniformados del Ejército se hizo en un grupo de WhatsApp, donde según autoridades se planeó el asesinato del excombatiente de las Farc.

02 Nov 2019, 08:12

El hecho tiene que ver con la muerte de Dimar Torres a manos de militares, el pasado 22 de abril en Ocaña (Norte de Santander), y varias conversiones que reposan en ese grupo las reveló la Fiscalía y las difundió la revista Semana.
“Mi coronel, ya lo maté”, le dijo, según ese medio, el cabo Daniel Eduardo Gómez Robledo a su superior, el coronel Jorge Armando Pérez Amézquita.
Como el suboficial también le hizo saber que en la zona había varios habitantes y conocidos de Torres que estaban preguntando por él, pues según la información preliminar la comunidad sorprendió a los militares cuando excavaban una fosa al parecer para sepultar a la víctima, la orden del coronel fue que los vigilara por si debían proceder.
“Chequéelos, chequéelos, porque esos son los que siguen”, dijo el oficial Pérez, según reveló el fiscal del caso, declaración que recogió la revista.
Otra de las instrucciones que, según ese medio, le dio Pérez a su subalterno, fue que se comunicaran solo por el chat, y que saliera al aire por el radio oficial para hacer un reporte en el que tergiversara los hechos.
Con estas y otras pruebas en su contra, y luego de que un alto oficial del Ejército reconociera que Torres había muerto a manos de militares y hasta pidiera perdón, Semana dice que la Fiscalía llamó al coronel Pérez (excomandante del batallón de Operaciones Terrestres No. 11, adscrito a la Fuerza de Tarea Vulcano) para imputarle cargos por el delito de homicidio en persona protegida. También, a tres asoldados que estarían implicados.
No obstante, la revista advierte que en este caso ha habido “dilaciones” de parte de la defensa del coronel Pérez, que pidió llevar su caso a la Justicia Penal Militar pese a que la muerte del excombatiente no se dio en el ejercicio de sus tareas militares.
Fue por eso que la audiencia se truncó y el oficial quedó en libertad junto con los otros tres implicados, y este viernes La FM informó que el coronel Pérez no tiene ninguna restricción que le impida salir del país.
“En este momento, como la audiencia se suspendió, no existe elemento alguno o medida que se pueda disponer en relación con él, porque  la audiencia se suspendió por cuenta de la decisión del juez de control de garantías”, señaló el fiscal encargado Fabio Espitia, aunque de acuerdo con la emisora el funcionario confirmó que con los elementos de juicio que tiene ese organismo la Fiscalía puede “solicitar una imputación y una medida de aseguramiento”.
text:
Funds for the Irccs, the associations: "Projects for autistic children"
02 Nov 2019, 08:23 by.

The associations are asking for more attention for the projects to be carried out at the Biopark of neurofragility in Mortelle

The following is the reflection by the coordinator of the table for autism Pino Currò with reference to the 91 mln for Irccs-Neurolesi and to the initiatives for children with autism spectrum
I welcomed the news of the agreement signed between the Ministry for Health and the homonymous Regional Councilorship concerning the financing of 91 million in favor of the IRCCS-PIEMONTE. These sums will mainly be used for the redevelopment and restructuring of hospitals and some buildings. A sum will also be allocated to the Bioparco of Neurofragilità that insists in the Marino Institute of Mortelle. It has been said that it will be used to start pet therapy with donkeys, dogs and horses and for dolphin therapy.
The center of excellence
At this point, I am obliged to submit some clarifications to the memory of those who, especially from the past and current administrators of this city, have hired so many hopes on the use of the aforementioned Marino Marino Institute. I cannot help remembering how the intent expressed by many in the past was that it became a center of excellence for interventions in favor of children and young people suffering from Autistic Spectrum Disorder.
The agreement for the Bioparco
A theme that is increasingly emerging and too undervalued, as was reiterated in the recent Conference held on 25 October at the Messina Palacultura. To this end, within the Marino Institute, from 2014 the National Research Center (CNR) operates. Subsequently the Accorinti Council decided to promote, on 04.04.2017, a Program Agreement between the aforementioned C.N.R. and the I.R.C.C. for the realization of a Biopark of Neurofragility, in which the two Bodies are assigned different but complementary competences, however with common operating addresses. In recent years there have been many hopes expressed by many families with autistic children who finally saw the fulfillment of their expectations looming on the horizon, with the creation of a Pole for Autism.
What has gradually occurred is the progressive thinning of the initial projects conceived in favor of this type of pathology, in favor of other interventions that are not well defined. The IRCCS Neurolesi certainly represents a Center of excellence in its field of action and not only in Messina. But its original characterization until now has not benefited the aims of the Autistic Spectrum within the Biopark.
Networking
It would have been opportune, a greater connotation towards this side and in any case, the choice to make use of skills and experiences already present in the territory of Messina also and above all in a relationship of integration and active, as well as indispensable, collaboration. Starting from within the Marino Institute itself. As specified in the Program Agreement established by the Accorinti Council. In short, the necessity of making a network becomes inevitable, which, in the recent conference mentioned above, was forcefully recalled by all the managers of the socio-sanitary organizations as well as the academics present.
The proposals
For this reason, I believe that, even today, for example, the decades-long experience of the Veterinary Faculty can be used for Pet Therapy. While I point out that the Delfinoterapia in the treatment of Autism Spectrum Disorder is absolutely secondary and non-resolutive. Therefore I return to the request that, as parents, is more important to us. How much and how much of the financed amount can actually be allocated to address the multiplicity of needs of autistic children? Especially in the adolescent and adult phase, which, it is known, is totally uncovered by targeted interventions. We would not like to be faced with the umpteenth disappointment.
Dr. Giuseppe Currò
Coordinator of the Autism Technical Table - Municipality of Messina
